data.name: Bystander_Line_001
data.value: Eh...?[pause=0] Another team looking to climb the mountain?[br]Well...[pause=30] good luck,[pause=30] I guess...

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_001
data.value: What a fool...[pause=0] One does not simply walk through the {0}.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_002
data.value: Hohoo![pause=0] Don't get ahead of yourself, young one.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_003
data.value: That dungeon has long been known as the most dangerous of this entire island!

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_004
data.value: You are an explorer, correct?[pause=0] Tell me, what is the name of your team?

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_005
data.value: So, your group is known as [color=#FFA5FF]{0}[color]?

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_006
data.value: Hohoo... I certainly hope you know what you're getting into...

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_007
data.value: Many teams have attempted the {0}, yet not a single one has met with success.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_008
data.value: Might I suggest an alternative?

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_009
data.value: Head East and you will find a camp of friendly Pokémon.[pause=0] You can stock up on supplies there.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_010
data.value: If you are looking to explore this island, I suggest you start with the {0}, up North.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_011
data.value: And if you seek knowledge of Mystery Dungeons, come and speak to me.

data.name: Ferry_Line_001
data.value: I'm Lapras![pause=0] If you need a ride,[pause=30] I can take you to the surrounding islands.

data.name: Ferry_Line_002
data.value: Where would you like to go?

data.name: Ferry_Line_003
data.value: Then let us be off!

data.name: Noctowl_Action_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]You've cleared guildmaster trail but this island still holds many secrets.

data.name: Noctowl_Ask_Tutorial
data.value: Fancy a visit to the {0}?

data.name: Noctowl_Reward_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Your badge... that insignia!

data.name: Noctowl_Reward_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Never did I think someone would conquer all of the Guildmaster Trail.[br]But you've proved me wrong.

data.name: Noctowl_Reward_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]A token of my appreciation. You've earned it.

data.name: Noctowl_Reward_Line_004
data.value: [tmp]I look forward to your future endeavors.

data.name: Noctowl_Tutorial_End
data.value: Best of luck with your journeys.

data.name: Noctowl_Tutorial_Line_001
data.value: Mystery Dungeons are unpredictable, changing their layouts constantly. Not so with the {0}!

data.name: Noctowl_Tutorial_Line_002
data.value: Here you will learn the basics of adventuring, and experiment without fear of failure.

data.name: Noctowl_Tutorial_Line_003
data.value: Your level will be temporarily reset, and progress in the dungeon won't be recorded.

data.name: Outside_Line_001
data.value: Guildmaster Island's home to the last of the Mystery Dungeons.[br]They're strange places that shift and change each time you enter.[br]They vanished from the rest of the world a long time ago, but this place is full of them...

data.name: Unlucky_Line_001
data.value: I thought I'd be safe if I kept my distance from wild Pokémon.[br]But they lunged at me with Tackle,[pause=0] and hit me from afar with Water Gun!

data.name: Unlucky_Line_002
data.value: I didn't stand a chance.[pause=0] Sigh...

data.name: Sign_Action_Text
data.value: North: Dungeon Entrance\nEast: Base Town

data.name: Statue_Center_Text
data.value: {0}\n\n{1} cleared the Summit of Guildmaster Island!

data.name: Statue_Left_Text
data.value: {0}\n\n{1} discovered all dungeons on Guildmaster Island!

data.name: Statue_Right_Text
data.value: {0}\n\n{1} helped every Pokémon on Guildmaster Island!

data.name: Steel_Complete_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Thanks for helping my partner![br]Guildmaster is a straight shot to the top, or so they say.[br]We were hoping to cut straight through but got burned in the end.[br]You're the guy that gave us that meta coat arent you?[br]Here, we're sharing our loot this time.

data.name: Steel_Complete_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Now we poof.

data.name: Steel_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]My partner is stuck at guildmaster 15F! Please help!

data.name: Steel_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]My partner is stuck at guildmaster 15F! Please help! (quest given)

data.name: Warn_Line_001
data.value: I'd stay away from Guildmaster Trail if I were you.

data.name: Warn_Line_002
data.value: Your experience, your moves, even most of your items- You can't take those in.

data.name: Warn_Line_003
data.value: Even in the years past, no explorer's been able to conquer that challenge.

data.name: Catch_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]We're playing catch by the beach!

data.name: Catch_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]And we'll drop more info about throw mechanics while we're at it!
